content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

CLICK HERE TO VOTE.

Every year, prestigious travel magazine Condé Nast Traveller conducts research for its global Reader’s Choice Awards and encourages its readers and guests to vote for their favourite destinations and travel companies.

According to readers’ votes, Zagreb’s very own jewel, the Esplanade Hotel, also found a place on the Reader’s Choice Awards in 2022. It was ranked in the category of the 20 Best Hotels in Central Europe, assuming a high eighth place as the only hotel from Croatia and the region, which confirmed its prestige and luxury at the world level.

Therefore, we again invite you to spare a few minutes this year to cast your vote.

This is an opportunity to convey your impressions about us. The Esplanade Zagreb Hotel was nominated in the category of Hotels & Resorts. Click here to share your experience. Voting for the Reader’s Choice Awards 2023 has already started and is ongoing until 30 June 2023.

We sincerely thank you for your support and look forward to meeting you again soon at the Esplanade Hotel Zagreb.

Your

Esplanade Hotel team

Published: May 17th, 2023.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: The travel magazine Condé Nast Traveler invites you to vote for your favorite destinations and travel companies in the 2023 Reader’s Choice Awards.
